Title: Object: The Israelites in Egypt: Water Carriers
Series: Dalziels' Bible Gallery
Description: Two Izraelite women in Egypt, half-length, walking to right on a hill, carrying water vessels on their heads; building with hieroglyphs at left; other water carriers seen below at right; after Edward John Poynter. Wood-engraving
Curator's comments: The print was published in 'Dalziels' Bible Gallery' in 1880.
